name: Request Logger
description: Logs gd requests to console or a file

log-to-console.name: Log to Console
log-to-console.description:
For console logs to be visibile, platform console must be activated

Open Geode Settings -> "Show Platform Console"

log-to-file.name: Log to File
log-to-file.description: will log each request to a new file in geode/log, password hide and separator setting will have no effect

hide-gjp2.name: Console Hide password
hide-gjp2.description: The hashed password is sent as the gjp2 key and you should not share it, as such this option hides it automatically
